summary.span: 将字段标记为易失字段。

remarks.format: ## Remarks `IsVolatile` 用于仅在自定义修饰符的方法签名中指示它标记的字段为可变型。`IsVolatile` is used only in custom modifiers of method signatures to indicate that the field it marks is volatile. 将元数据导入包含一个或多个字段标记为易失性任何编译器必须使用与为前缀的指令`volatile.`来访问这些字段。Any compiler that imports metadata with one or more fields marked as volatile must use instructions prefixed with `volatile.` to access such fields. 中的类编译器编写器仅供使用。The classes in are for compiler writers' use only. 编译器发出元数据，以更改默认行为不恰当时，会在实时 (JIT) 编译器处理值的方式中的自定义修饰符。Compilers emit custom modifiers within metadata to change the way that the just-in-time (JIT) compiler handles values when the default behavior is not appropriate. 当 JIT 编译器遇到了一个自定义修饰符时，它将处理修饰符指定的方法中的值。When the JIT compiler encounters a custom modifier, it handles the value in the way that the modifier specifies. 编译器可以将自定义修饰符应用于方法、 参数和返回值。Compilers can apply custom modifiers to methods, parameters, and return values. JIT 编译器必须响应所需修饰符，但可以忽略可选修饰符。The JIT compiler must respond to required modifiers but can ignore optional modifiers. C + + 编译器无法发出一个自定义修饰符来描述一个字节应如何处理在其中 JIT 编译器将字节与 c + + 不兼容的方式的情况下默认情况下。A C++ compiler could emit a custom modifier to describe how a byte should be treated in cases where the JIT compiler treats bytes in a manner that is not compatible with C++ by default. 可以将自定义修饰符发出到元数据中使用以下方法之一：You can emit custom modifiers into metadata using one of the following techniques: - 使用中的方法类如， ， ，和。Using methods in the class such as , , , and . - 生成包含对的调用的 Microsoft 中间语言 (MSIL) 指令文件`modopt`和`modreq`，再将包含的文件内容组合[Ilasm.exe （IL 汇编程序）](~/docs/framework/tools/ilasm-exe-il-assembler.md)。Generating a Microsoft intermediate language (MSIL) instruction file that contains calls to `modopt` and `modreq`, and assembling the file with the [Ilasm.exe (IL Assembler)](~/docs/framework/tools/ilasm-exe-il-assembler.md). - 使用非托管的反射 API。Using the unmanaged reflection API.
